perturbation.original_text: This Agreement is effective as of the last date signed below ("Effective Date"). The initial term of this Agreement will begin on the Effective Date and end twelve (12) months after the Launch (the "Term"). IMNTV will extend the Agreement on the same terms and conditions for additional one-year terms, providing Distributor and IMNTV agree, predicated on satisfactory performance by both parties IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement by their duly authorized representatives.     DISTRIBUTOR
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement is effective as of the last date signed below ("Effective Date"). The initial term of this Agreement will begin on the Effective Date and end twelve (12) months after the Launch (the "Term"). IMNTV may, at its sole discretion, extend the Agreement. The terms and conditions for any extension are subject to negotiation and mutual agreement by both parties. This extension is not predicated on satisfactory performance by either party and IMNTV can terminate the contract at any time. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement by their duly authorized representatives.     DISTRIBUTOR
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the agreement would be extended on the same terms and conditions for additional one-year terms, provided both parties agree and performance is satisfactory. The modified version introduces uncertainty by stating that IMNTV has sole discretion in extending the agreement, terms of the extension are subject to negotiation, not predicated on satisfactory performance, and IMNTV can terminate the contract at any time. This contradicts the original text's implication of a more mutually assured renewal based on satisfactory performance, and creates uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: During the Term, for the activities described in this Agreement, IMNTV hereby grants Distributor non-exclusive rights and licenses necessary within the Territory to: (a) copy, store digitally, host and stream the Programming; (b) publicly perform, publicly display, electronically transmit, distribute and broadcast the Programming; (c) promote the Programming and use IMNTV Marks for Distributor's promotion of the Programming as activities described in Section 2.4 above; (d) archive the Programming on Distributor's servers; (e) encode, copy, and create continuous Programming excerpts of up to sixty (60) seconds and transmit, publicly perform, distribute, and redistribute such excerpts to end users via the Distributor's Portal for marketing purposes only(f) deep link to the Programming.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, for the activities described in this Agreement, IMNTV hereby grants Distributor conditional rights and licenses within the Territory to: (a) copy, store digitally, host and stream the Programming; (b) publicly perform, publicly display, electronically transmit, distribute and broadcast the Programming, subject to written approval by IMNTV for each instance; (c) promote the Programming and use IMNTV Marks for Distributor's promotion of the Programming as activities described in Section 2.4 above, only upon approval by IMNTV's marketing team; (d) archive the Programming on Distributor's servers only in the United States; (e) encode, copy, and create continuous Programming excerpts of up to sixty (60) seconds and transmit, publicly perform, distribute, and redistribute such excerpts to end users via the Distributor's Portal for marketing purposes only after receiving express permission from IMNTV; (f) deep link to the Programming, subject to monthly review and approval by IMNTV.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants the Distributor non-exclusive rights to perform certain actions. The modified text introduces conditional rights, requiring written approval, express permission or review for many of these actions. This contradicts the initial grant of non-exclusive rights, creating uncertainty about the Distributor's actual freedom to act under the agreement without constant IMNTV oversight and permission.

perturbation.original_text: EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH HEREIN, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS RELATING TO THE SUBSCRIPTION PRODUCTS, OR THE LIKELIHOOD OF SUCCESS OF THE PROGRAMMING, THE MOBILE NTENT PRODUCT, OR ANY BUNDLE. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IMNTV FURTHER DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES IN THE SUBSCRIPTION PRODUCTS, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH HEREIN, Distributor makes warranties and representations relating to the success of the programming and bundle to IMNTV, the product's consumer appeal and the revenue expected to be generated. IMNTV disclaims all warranties in the subscription products, including without limitation any implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that NEITHER party makes any guarantees of the programming. Changing this so the Distributor DOES make guarantees contradicts this, and puts IMNTV in a position where they are being guaranteed income. The original text puts the risk on IMNTV, while the modified places it on the Distributor
